^ It is good to give praise to the Lord: et in operibus manuum tuārum exsultābō. ^ For thou hast given me

et psallere nōminī tuō: Domine. Nimis profundae factae sunt cōgitātiōnēs tuae. ^ How great are thy works
Altissime: O Lord. Thy thoughts are exceeding deep.

et psallere nōminī tuō: et stultus nōn intelleget haec. ^ The senseless man shall not know

et psallere nōminī tuō: et appāruerint omnēs quī operantur inīquitātem

^ It is good to give praise to the Lord: and all the workers of iniquity shall appear

et psallere nōminī tuō: Domine. ^ but thou art the Most High for evermore

column7: and all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.

2 ^ Bonum est confitērī Dominō: 11 ^ Et exaltābitur sīcut ūnicornis cornū meum
et psallere nōminī tuō: et senectūs mea in misericordiā ūberī. ^ And my horn shall be exalted like that of the unicorn
Altissime: and my old age in plentiful mercy.

2 ^ Bonum est confitērī Dominō: 12 ^ Et dēspexit oculus meus inimīcōs meōs
et psallere nōminī tuō: et in insurgentibus in mē malignantibus audiet auris mea. ^ And my eye hath looked down upon my enemies
Altissime: and my ear shall hear of the downfall of the malignant that rise up against me.

et psallere nōminī tuō: in ātriīs domus Deī nostrī flōrēbunt. ^ They that are planted in the house of the Lord
Altissime: in the courts of the house of our God they shall flourish.

2 ^ Bonum est confitērī Dominō: 16 ^ ut adnuntient quoniam rectus Dominus Deus noster
et psallere nōminī tuō: et nōn est inīquitās in eō. ^ that they may show that the Lord our God is righteous
